mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM volun_bbs v JOIN club_apply a ON v.volunIdx=a.volunIdx

SELECT a.CLUBAPPLYIDX,v.volunIdx AS volunIdx, s.serviceName, subject, v.startDay, v.endDay, a.enabled, progress, place, volunteer_type, v.volunDays, v.typeIdx1, v.typeIdx2, startTime, endTime, content,v.created,v.modified, ( (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM club_apply_memlist c JOIN club_apply a ON c.clubApplyIdx=a.clubApplyIdx WHERE a.volunIdx = v.volunIdx)+ ( SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM volun_bbs_memlist vb WHERE vb.volunIdx=v.volunIdx))AS applyNum, (select sum(maxNum) from MEMNUMPERDATE mnpd where mnpd.volunIdx=v.volunIdx ) as maxNum FROM volun_bbs v JOIN club_apply a ON v.volunIdx=a.volunIdx JOIN serviceInfo s ON v.serviceIdx=s.serviceIdx WHERE clubApplyIdx = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE volun_bbs SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE volunIdx= #{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT clubApplyIdx, subject, progress FROM volun_bbs v JOIN club_apply a ON v.volunIdx=a.volunIdx
AND (clubApplyIdx > #{num})
ORDER BY clubApplyIdx ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT clubApplyIdx, subject, progress FROM volun_bbs v JOIN club_apply a ON v.volunIdx=a.volunIdx
AND (clubApplyIdx < #{num})
ORDER BY clubApplyIdx DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club_applyR(CARIDX , clubApplyIdx, userIdx, content, answer) VALUES (#{replyNum}, #{num},#{userIdx}, #{content}, #{answer})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM club_applyR WHERE clubApplyIdx=#{num} AND answer=0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, tb.* FROM ( SELECT tbreply.CARIDX as replyNum, clubApplyIdx as num, userId, userName ,content, created, tbreply.answer ,NVL(answerCount, 0) answerCount FROM ( ( SELECT CARIDX, r.clubApplyIdx, r.userIdx, userid, userName, r.content, r.created, answer FROM club_applyR r JOIN club_apply a ON r.clubApplyIdx=a.clubApplyIdx JOIN memberinfo m ON r.userIdx=m.userIdx WHERE r.clubApplyIdx=#{num} AND answer=0 ) tbreply LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT answer, COUNT(*) answerCount FROM club_applyR GROUP BY answer ) tbanswer ON tbreply.CARIDX = tbanswer.answer ) ORDER BY replyNum DESC
) tb WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} ) WHERE rnum >= #{start}
